mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM approval a JOIN ( SELECT al.approval_id, al.assigner, al.next_assigner, LEVEL AS lvl FROM approval_line al START WITH al.assigner IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR al.next_assigner = al.assigner AND PRIOR al.approval_id = al.approval_id ) lineage ON lineage.approval_id = a.id WHERE ( a.writer = #{userId} OR ( lineage.assigner = #{userId} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM approval_history ah WHERE ah.approval_id = lineage.approval_id AND ah.assigner = ( SELECT assigner FROM approval_line WHERE approval_id = lineage.approval_id AND next_assigner = #{userId} ) AND (ah.recorded_at between a.updated_at and sysdate OR a.updated_at is null) )));
